title: Accompanying Ophelia!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Ooh, the wind on the beach really is strong... Shioriko-san, are you alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, I’m fine. We might be cold, but at least Ophelia looks like she’s having fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hmhm, I think so too. But I’m sorry for having you walk with me even though you’d already come all the way here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Don’t worry about it, I think walking can be fun. Ophelia sure is a well-behaved girl. She looks so smart, too…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You understand too!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Huh? Y-yes…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ophelia is a really special girl. She doesn’t bark often, but when she does, they’re so graceful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>And she really loves you, doesn’t she? During our walk, she’s constantly been looking up at you, Shizuku-san. It’s really cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ehehe, you’re such a good girl. Hey, do you want to hold her leash?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Are you sure? Hmhm, okay then, Ophelia, with your permission, I’ll accompany you now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
